name: All Aboard the Iron Dragon
description:
"All Aboard the Iron Dragon" is a snapshot of our D&D group's adventure aboard a super-fast train.  Our campaign is set in the wild west and makes use of the Deadlands (Savage Worlds) RPG system.

In this short game, you play as Professor Grisrock as he explores the train and attempts to share a loaf of bread with his companion, Hoover.
